FuncDef: This command holds the BRG object for the specified time. This applies when the connectivity verification fails or when the last host is removed andno connectivity-verificationis enabled. Hold time does not apply to an explicit removal via theradiusorclearcommands.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the time, in seconds, to hold on to a BRG after the system considered it down. Values-30 to 2592000.
Specifies the hold-time in days. Values-1 to 30.
Specifies the hold-time in hours. Values-1 to 23.
Specifies the hold-time in minutes. Values-1 to 59.
Specifies the hold-time in seconds. Values-1 to 59.
